sub_title: Senior Associate European Knowledge Group at IBFD
summary:
Tax lawyer with solid knowledge in international tax law and EU tax law. Professional experience of five years in a high-ranked law firm in applying tax treaties in cross-border scenarios and structuring corporate tax planning for a great range of multinational enterprises, as well as in writing/editing the content of KPMG’ tax technical publications to be provided to their network in Europe. Advanced LL.M. in International Tax Law by International Tax Center of Leiden University.

- Tax lawyer with some international experience applying tax treaties, has dealt with the main tax issues regarding corporate reorganizations, due diligence, tax planning schemes for multinational enterprises as well as VAT regarding domestic situations. After studying OECD tax treaties, EU Tax Law, Customs Law, VAT and Transfer Pricing, I am fully aware of the most relevant issues that multinational enterprises have to face in Europe. That is why I am seeking for a new opportunity to work as an international tax specialist in Europe as well as to be able to work on transfer pricing matters.

profile_positions.description:
- Writes notes, articles, surveys, updates and other analytical material on the assigned portfolio of European countries (Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, Denmark, Norway, Guernsey, Jersey, Gibraltar and the Isle of Man), on EU tax law and international tax law for IBFD publications. 
- Undertakes high-quality technical editorial work on assigned publications and research reports. 
- Editorial review of the work of other editors in the Knowledge Group. 
- Provides tax expertise for the development of new content and tools, and for tax research projects. 
- Monitores and reports on tax, investment, and company law developments in assigned countries of responsibility. 
- Provides answers to client queries and manages client accounts. 
- Provides occasional support to other departments of IBFD, e.g. the International Tax Training and the Government Consultancy Department.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate Europe

profile_positions.description:
- Provided tax technical support on EU direct tax law and international tax law relevant for all KPMG member firms in Europe and their clients.
- Monitored international tax developments in the corporate tax systems of the European countries in order to provide regular tax alerts to KPMG’s network in Europe. Writing and editing of updates’ content and any other KMPG publications.
- Contributed to the research support in the team in order to solve relevant tax issues from an international perspective.
- Contributed to KPMG tax publications, development of presentation materials, coordination of EU wide tax surveys and development of materials for maintaining internal and external websites.
profile_positions.title: Intern at KPMG's EU Tax Centre

profile_positions.description:
- Structured tax planning schemes through the use of joint ventures structures and investment funds to one of the most diversified and large economic groups in Peru with subsidiaries in Latin America (tax savings of $50MM). 
- Provided tax advisory to a great range of multinational enterprises in respect of the use of the tax treaties signed by Peru. Optimization of their business activities and inter-company operations through tax efficient structures. 
- Provided corporate tax planning to important retailers and manufacturing companies, including tax advice in contract negotiations and acquisitions to be included in their business plans. Successful implementation of some proposals regarding the signing of tax stability regimes with the Peruvian government (including assistance in the proceedings).
- Structured tax efficient schemes to one of the most important US Funds regarding the acquisition of tourism agencies in Peru for $70MM (including tax due diligence). 
- Drafted several official reports upon request of the Peruvian government regarding the application of tax treaties on export services in major industries. Pragmatic approach design supplemented with real cases.
- Provided tax advisory to important hotel chains regarding the early recovery of VAT during the preoperative phase ($9MM), as well as advisory regarding the VAT benefits in the hospitality industry.
